xwikidoc.title: WebHome
xwikidoc.content:
[[Update agent data>>GlimpseCode.UpdateAgentData]]
{{velocity}} #set($agents = $xwiki.search("select doc.title, doc.fullName from XWikiDocument doc where doc.space = 'Glimpse' and doc.name like 'Agent_%'")) #set($glimpses = $xwiki.search("select doc.title, doc.fullName from XWikiDocument doc where doc.space = 'Glimpse' and doc.name like 'GlimpseOn%'"))
= Glimpses
#foreach($glimpse in $glimpses) * [[$glimpse[0]>>$glimpse[1]]] #end
= Agents
#foreach($agent in $agents) * [[$agent[0]>>$agent[1]]] #end {{/velocity}}
